subject: horizon is removing the URL path from glance's endpoint
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2013-10-09 18:42:43.000000000', 'files': ['openstack_dashboard/api/glance.py'], 'web_link': 'https://opendev.org/openstack/horizon/commit/20e414541613aa14d43ed1eaa4a23d84bff9279e', 'message': 'horizon is removing the URL path from glance's endpoint

Autor: Raildo Mascena <raildo@lsd.ufcg.edu.br>

Glanceclient removes the API version from the endpoint in case it exists. Look the following code:

https://github.com/openstack/python-glanceclient/blob/master/glanceclient/shell.py#L310

    def _strip_version(self, endpoint):
        """Strip version from the last component of endpoint if present."""

        # Get rid of trailing '/' if present
        if endpoint.endswith('/'):
            endpoint = endpoint[:-1]
        url_bits = endpoint.split('/')
        # regex to match 'v1' or 'v2.0' etc
        if re.match('v\d+\.?\d*', url_bits[-1]):
            endpoint = '/'.join(url_bits[:-1])
        return endpoint

The rest of code includes the API version in use accordingly.

Change-Id: If896b8793095c4c23569b482497bf9d886170b2b
'}]
commit_message:
horizon is removing the URL path from glance's endpoint

Autor: Raildo Mascena <raildo@lsd.ufcg.edu.br>

Glanceclient removes the API version from the endpoint in case it exists. Look the following code:

https://github.com/openstack/python-glanceclient/blob/master/glanceclient/shell.py#L310

    def _strip_version(self, endpoint):
        """Strip version from the last component of endpoint if present."""

        # Get rid of trailing '/' if present
        if endpoint.endswith('/'):
            endpoint = endpoint[:-1]
        url_bits = endpoint.split('/')
        # regex to match 'v1' or 'v2.0' etc
        if re.match('v\d+\.?\d*', url_bits[-1]):
            endpoint = '/'.join(url_bits[:-1])
        return endpoint

The rest of code includes the API version in use accordingly.

Change-Id: If896b8793095c4c23569b482497bf9d886170b2b
git_command: git fetch https://review.opendev.org/openstack/horizon refs/changes/09/50709/1 && git format-patch -1 --stdout FETCH_HEAD

'}, {'number': 2, 'created': '2013-10-06 02:35:09.000000000', 'files': [], 'web_link': 'https://opendev.org/openstack/taskflow/commit/41391c36aeaad23e8ba384f35fa8903e5bb939cc', 'message': 'Start work on eventlet executor/utils

Part of blueprint eventlet-engine

Change-Id: Ida9ce6183471ad6b323a3c9ca863561699e32ddc
'}, {'number': 3, 'created': '2013-10-06 02:48:54.000000000', 'files': [], 'web_link': 'https://opendev.org/openstack/taskflow/commit/8318b954669d99c1cccf2d9c44e97ce8b71b0ca5', 'message': 'Create a eventlet executor & futures

In order to use the multi-threaded engine
which takes an executor as input for projects
which have not eventlet monkey patched the
threading module we can create a eventlet
compatible executor and future objects which
can work with the same multi-threaded engine
for projects which use eventlet.

Part of blueprint eventlet-engine

Change-Id: Ida9ce6183471ad6b323a3c9ca863561699e32ddc
'}, {'number': 4, 'created': '2013-10-06 02:50:51.000000000', 'files': [], 'web_link': 'https://opendev.org/openstack/taskflow/commit/f724bdb1d74d9b97d04de14f1218ee155b78e77e', 'message': 'Create a eventlet executor & futures

In order to use the multi-threaded engine
which takes an executor as input for projects
which have not eventlet monkey patched the
threading module we can create a eventlet
compatible executor and future objects which
can work with the same multi-threaded engine
for projects which use eventlet.

This executor also works in natively threaded
applications by correctly altering the future
condition attribute to use a greened condition,
which is required to make sure that green threads
run when the condition is waited on.

Part of blueprint eventlet-engine

Change-Id: Ida9ce6183471ad6b323a3c9ca863561699e32ddc

commit_message:
Create a green executor & green future

In order to use the multi-threaded engine
which takes an executor as input for projects
which have *not* eventlet monkey patched the
threading module we provide a eventlet
compatible executor and future objects which
can work with the same multi-threaded engine.

This executor also works in natively threaded
applications by correctly altering the future
condition attribute to use a greened condition,
which is required to make sure that greenthreads
run when the condition is waited on.

blueprint eventlet-engine

Change-Id: Ida9ce6183471ad6b323a3c9ca863561699e32ddc

commit_message:
Add state to dot->svg tool

Add a helper tool that can convert the
allowed state transitions into a dot graph
which itself then converts it into a browser
compatible svg file, which can then be looked
at to have a pretty state diagram.

Change-Id: I3cbbc75bd58182700ddc07f00395da5d1093a26c

added_lines: ret = None if logfile: if logdir: ret = os.path.join(logdir, logfile) else: ret = logfile else: if logdir: binary = binary or _get_binary_name() ret = '%s.log' % (os.path.join(logdir, binary),) else: raise error("Both logfile and logdir are not set.") return ret
deleted_lines: if logfile and not logdir: return logfile if logfile and logdir: return os.path.join(logdir, logfile) if logdir: binary = binary or _get_binary_name() return '%s.log' % (os.path.join(logdir, binary),)

commit_message:
library six minimum version must be specified

Some modules in Ceilometer uses library six and uses method add_metaclass,
however, that only existed in six 1.3.0 and above. The ceilometer
requirements.txt should be updated to reflect that.

Change-Id: Idbc0653784b4dd0bbdd7bd0b0cb4705e497b5991
fixes: bug# 1237089
git_command: git fetch https://review.opendev.org/openstack/ceilometer refs/changes/92/50492/1 && git format-patch -1 --stdout FETCH_HEAD

commit_message:
Revert "Fix last commit using "of" instead of "or""

This reverts the text change of

commit_message:
module six needs to be updated to at least 1.3.0

module six earlier version (less than 1.3.0) does not have add_metaclass
project ceilometer needs to use these methods. So the update is needed.

Change-Id: Ibba3288b255604d04413d65d287696b720ee1a2a

commit_message:
Fix incorrect exception raised during evacuate

This change creates a new exception 'ComputeServiceInUse'
to better represent the error when trying to evacuate
an instance with a running compute service. Also, it adds
a missing test for evacuate API v3.

Closes-Bug: #1230282

Change-Id: I1c4edb01e84cd2a89879bca9c99f5e38f47e16fb

commit_message:
Make tripleo-cd use local stackrc

We can't deploy without these bits. Note that this is just a stop-gap
until we can configure these settings via Heat.

commit_message:
BigSwitch: sync state on disassociate floating ip

Sends the state of port's parent network to the backend controller
when a floating IP is disassociated from a port.

Closes-Bug: #1235074
Change-Id: I8375e6564b5d08f1adc7e7aef6affc97c8d03c5e
(cherry picked from commit 0bae949eed229613c77c4943edbf68c1c140f977)

commit_message:
Import translations for Havana release

* Import translation update of 100% completed languages.
  12 translated languages are avaialable.
* Russian (ru) and Chinese Taiwan (zh_tw) newly completed their
  translations since RC1. They are added to the language list.
* Update POT files

This commit is directly proposed to milestone-proposed branch
because the master branch is already opened for Icehouse development
and the translatable strings are no longer same as those in Havana.

I believe it is the final import.

Change-Id: I9e8e7c28fae64f1aad7fbd5f226910fb9ee6a325
Closes-Bug: #1234317
